meanings.sent1: I will remail the package to you tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Please remail the letter if it doesn't reach its destination.
meanings.sent3: The post office had to remail the lost package three times!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness remailed in my heart long after she left.
meanings.sent5: The echo remailed through the empty hallway, bouncing off the walls.

meanings.definition: A service that forwards email to a new address.
meanings.sent1: The remail helped me receive important messages while traveling.
meanings.sent2: I signed up for a remail to ensure I don't miss any emails.
meanings.sent3: The remail made sure I got all my emails, even the spam!
meanings.sent4: The remail acted like a helpful messenger, delivering emails promptly.
meanings.sent5: With the remail, I never worry about missing an important email again.
